name: Tower Siege (pl41d)
description:
Tower siege is a game about protecting the tower from waves of attacking giant monsters. The monsters lurk in the forest nearby waiting in slumber. Some are slow while some are fast. They will come from the forest on all sides to destroy the tower. Use your protector to hammer them down or use other means to defend from certain destruction. If you can destroy them, what they leave behind can be collected and may be of some use.

This is a game of timing and strategy.

Touch to move your protector.

Touch the tower to start building defenses.

Survive the wave.
